attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Professor David Nutt was sacked from the position as chair of the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs for stating his opinion on the relative harm caused by using various drugs and other activities people take part in.
This is a ridiculous decision and was clearly made for political reasons and should be overturned.

The Prime Minister should bring back Professor David Nutt and follow his advice as it is clearly in the best interests of the country to have a drugs policy written on the basis of scientific evidence and not tabloid sensationalism.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
